mapper.select: select r.id, r.name from admin_role r left join admin_user__role ur on r.id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select a.id, a.name from admin_auth a left join admin_role__auth ra on ra.auth_id = a.id left join admin_role r on ra.role_id = r.id left join admin_user__role ur on ur.role_id = r.id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
